entry.title: Zelensky Visits Flood-Hit Kherson as Kyiv Presses Counterattack
entry.content: Russia claimed to have withstood an attempt by Kyiv’s military to break through its fortifications further east as signs emerge that Ukraine’s long-awaited offensive is under way.

entry.title: Hazardous Smoky Conditions to Last for Days as Canada Wildfires Rage
entry.content: Millions of Americans are being advised to stay indoors as the smoke continues to drift south.

entry.title: East Coast Gets a Taste of What It's Like Living With Wildfires
entry.content: Millions of Americans monitored air-quality levels and put plans on hold as smoke from Canadian wildfires kept people indoors.

entry.title: Cut Off From Food and Cash, Sudanese Starve as Fighting Drags On
entry.content: Hungry residents are searching for scraps as a lethal power struggle between rival generals has upended daily trade.
